description: Get detailed data for a component. For more information about components, see Proton components in the Proton User Guide.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the component that you want to get the detailed data for.

nested_items.name: component
nested_items.description: The detailed data of the requested component.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the component.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The time when the component was created.

nested_items.name: deploymentStatusMessage
nested_items.description: The message associated with the component deployment status.

nested_items.name: environmentName
nested_items.description: The name of the Proton environment that this component is associated with.

nested_items.name: lastAttemptedDeploymentId
nested_items.description: The ID of the last attempted deployment of this component.

nested_items.name: lastClientRequestToken
nested_items.description: The last token the client requested.

nested_items.name: lastDeploymentAttemptedAt
nested_items.description: The time when a deployment of the component was last attempted.

nested_items.name: lastDeploymentSucceededAt
nested_items.description: The time when the component was last deployed successfully.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedAt
nested_items.description: The time when the component was last modified.

nested_items.name: lastSucceededDeploymentId
nested_items.description: The ID of the last successful deployment of this component.

nested_items.name: serviceInstanceName
nested_items.description: The name of the service instance that this component is attached to. Provided when a component is attached to a service instance.

nested_items.name: serviceName
nested_items.description: The name of the service that serviceInstanceName is associated with. Provided when a component is attached to a service instance.

nested_items.name: serviceSpec
nested_items.description: The service spec that the component uses to access service inputs. Provided when a component is attached to a service instance.
